sentence: Craig led, with about 45 percent of respondents recognizing his name, followed by businessman Kevin Rinke and chiropractor Garrett Soldano at about 20 percent name recognition each.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Poll: Republicans Face Uphill Battle to Unseat Michigan Democrat Gov. Gretchen Whitmer

sentence: Republican businessman Kevin Rinke is leading the Republican gubernatorial field in fundraising, including a $2 million contribution to his own campaign.
author: Kate Scanlon
title: Republican candidate for Michigan governor sparks abortion controversy

sentence: Wealthy businessman Kevin Rinke, by contrast, raised a mere $5,000 from donors but self-funded $2 million, and his $1.5 million war chest was the largest of anyone running in the August GOP primary.
title: Morning Digest: Democrat announces rematch against House Republican under fire for impeachment vote

sentence: Meanwhile, GOP gubernatorial candidate Kevin Rinke launched a $500,000 two-week ad buy late last month on television, radio, and digital platforms.
author: Julia Manchester
title: Whitmer goes on offense amid barrage of GOP attacks in Michigan

sentence: The August primary also includes two wealthy businessmen, Kevin Rinke and Perry Johnson.
title: Daily Kos Elections Live Digest: 4/22

sentence: Craig is the current frontrunner in the Republican primary, but the primary field is packed with other candidates, including chiropractor Garrett Soldano, businessman Perry Johnson, real estate broker and activist Ryan Kelley, conservative commentator Tudor Dixon, and former car dealership owner Kevin Rinke.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Poll: Michigan Democrat Gretchen Whitmer Trails Republican on Generic Ballot for Governor's Race
